result.execSummary:
The defendant Richard L Harris Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 4th Degree Sexual Assault [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Incident, Habitual Criminality], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3m).
  • False Imprisonment [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse, Repeater], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.30.
  • Intimidate Victim/Use or Attempt Force [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Incident], a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.45(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Each count concur. Transfer of probation authorized to Illinois.
1/10/19 Crt grants def's request to self revocate and orders sentence vacated. Bail is revoked and def to be sentenced at a later date.

miscConds.notes: $343 to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.  Court authorized payment plan.  $250 DNA surcharge remitted.

Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with SW- contact with their mutual child, SWH, unless requested by SW & then only if supervised by third party. Def may have contact with biological children with YW.

Def to cooperate with all Dane County Child Support actions & orders. Pay supervision fees as determined by the Department of Corrections.  Defendant shall complete a risk and needs assessment and comply with care plan goals related to prioritized need areas identified.  Any other conditions DOC, Probation/Parole Department may impose.  Defendant advised of requirement to provide DNA sample. No objection to early termination of probation after 5 years if def has complied with all conditions of probation with no violations, ATR's or new charges rising to level of probable cause.
$92 VW surcharge to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.
All other conditions are the same as count 1.

timeConds.notes: Stayed for use at agent's discretion upon notice to the court and hearing set.

superMiscConds.notes: $250 DNA surcharge and court costs remitted. $92 VW surcharge  to be collected by the Dept of Corrections.

Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with SW or contact with their mutual child, SWH, unless requested by SW and then only if supervised by third party. Def may have contact with biological children with YW.

Def to cooperate with Dane Co Child Support actions & orders.  Defendant shall complete a risk and needs assessment and comply with care plan goals related to prioritized need areas identified.  Defendant advised of requirement to provide DNA sample-prev provided per DCSO.  Any other conditions DOC, Probation/Parole Department may impose.

judgments.dispoDesc: Def self revoked and sentence is now imposed.

SIGNATURE BOND SET - REFERRED TO BMP
- The court orders a signature bond in the amount of $1,000. per case on the condition that the defendant reports to, and complies with, Dane County Bail Monitoring (DCBM).  The defendant shall report to DCBM following his release from jail.  
- If defendant fails to comply with DCBM, cash bail is automatically set in the amount of $10,000. (per case), as higher cash bail is necessary to assure appearance in court. BMP is removed as condition of bond.
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with SRW and/or Kacy G
- Defendant shall not be at or on or around Tree Lane in Madison WI
- Defendant may travel to Illinois to establish employment, residence, etc while remaining on BMP.
